help.title: <u>WedNesDay & Zen's Functions</u>
help.text: Well, after helping some people, we decided to start our own library with functions that can help people.
help.title: Scripting Help Functions
help.text: The following functions may help you making general scripts.

function.name: temple
function.description: Returns wheter you're standing on the temple coordinates of the city town, or not, example: temple("thais")

function.name: hpcount
function.description: Returns the number of visible health potions, all types.

function.name: mpcount
function.description: Returns the number of visible mana potions, all types.

function.name: depositeronto
function.parameters: string dest, int itemid1, int itemid2...
function.description: Will deposit your stackable items on locker and open and deposit not stackable items on dest backpack.

function.name: tradetalk
function.description: Will make your character say the text parameter given, in Advertising channel and wait about 120 seconds. If it's not open, it will display an error message.

function.name: yell
function.description: Will make your character yell the text parameter given and wait about 30 seconds.

function.name: advertising
function.description: Will make your character yell the text parameter given, also say in Advertising channel and wait until not exhausted to say/yell again. If Advertising channel is not open, it will display an error message.

function.name: usepick
function.parameters: int posx, int posy, int posz, opt int holes
function.description: Will use the kind of pick you've in your inventory in a closed whole until it becomes a hole. If there's a moveable item above it, it will move it. If there's a non-moveable item above it, the function will return false. If the hole was opened successfully the function will return true. If the coordinates wasn't given the function will use the coordinates of the waypoints you're currently on.

example.name: Depositer
example.description: The action will deposit your stackable items on locker and open and deposit not stackable items on destination backpack.

content.name: depositer
content.input: Enter the name of the container from locker that you will open and move all the loot.
Enter the name of the loots.
